references.paper_title: A dataset of microscopic peripheral blood cell images for development of automatic recognition systems
references.reason: This paper is a key reference because it provides a dataset of microscopic peripheral blood cell images which is used to train automatic recognition systems, a relevant task in medical image analysis.
This paper is a significant reference due to its contribution of a dataset of breast ultrasound images, which is crucial for training models in the medical imaging field.

references.paper_title: Monkeypox skin lesion detection using deep learning models: A preliminary feasibility study
references.reason: This is an important reference as it explores the application of deep learning for detecting monkeypox skin lesions, a timely and relevant area of research in medical imaging.
This reference is important as it introduces the Endoscopy Disease Detection and Segmentation (EDD2020) dataset and methodology, which are relevant to the tasks in the current research.
This paper is a highly significant reference due to the introduction of the RSNA pneumonia detection challenge dataset, widely used in medical image analysis research.
